newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: SOCCER-PORTUGAL GO ON OFFENSIVE, BEAT ALBANIA 2-0.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-PORTUGAL GO ON OFFENSIVE, BEAT ALBANIA 2-0.

text.p: Portugal beat Albania 2-0 on Saturday in a European zone group nine World Cup qualifying match.
Portugal played offensively throughout the match against Albania. Joao Vieira Pinto opened the score with a header from a pass by winger Sergio Conceicao in the 14th minute.
Portuguese players missed a few opportunities to score before Luis Figo shot into the box over the head of Albanian goalkeeper Blendi Mallisami in the 71st minute.
After Ukraine held European champions Germany to a scoreless draw on Saturday, Portugal now stand in joint second place with Germany in the group with 12 points behind Ukraine with 14 points.
